description: This file defines a lightweight AI client function for generating a Statement of Work (SOW) content from a prompt by interacting with a local backend API at /api/ai/sow. It exports an asynchronous function that sends a POST request to the backend and handles responses and errors.

methods.name: generateSOWFromPrompt(promptText)
methods.description: Asynchronously sends a prompt to the backend API to generate a SOW draft, handling success and error cases, returning the result.
